product_name: NEOGENReal Fresh Cleansing Stick Green Tea
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNeogen's Real Fresh Cleansing Stick Green Tea is a gentle cleansing stick effectively removes dirt, excess oil, and makeup without stripping or irritating the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHypoallergenic cleansing stick made to gently melt away makeup and impuritiesInfused with real green tea leaves to lightly exfoliate and purify the skin for a brighter, clearer, and more refreshed complexionâ€”safe for daily useKey IngredientsGreen Tea - Protects the skin from damage caused by free radicals, reducing signs of aging like fine lines and wrinklesItem 2645130How To UseApply the cleansing stick on wet skin, and massage in circular motions to melt makeup. Lightly moisten the face to lather foam, then rinse off thoroughly with warm water.IngredientsGlycerin,Water(Aqua),Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Palmitic Acid/Stearic Acid,Lauryl Betaine,Betaine,Camellia Sinensis Leaf,Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil,Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower) Seed Oil,Limnanthes Alba(Meadowfoam) Seed Oil,Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil,Tocopheryl Acetate,Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil,Ocimum Basillicum (Basil) Oil,Cananga Odorata Flower Oil,Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil,Origanum Heracleoticum Flower Oil,Citrus Aurantium Dulcis(Orange) Peel Oil,Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply the cleansing stick on wet skin, and massage in circular motions to melt makeup. Lightly moisten the face to lather foam, then rinse off thoroughly with warm water.
